name: Xhkarsh
description: A formidable Large Aberration with a keen intellect, sleek form, and natural armor providing a tough challenge.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate the fates of its targets through magical corruption makes it a uniquely dangerous opponent.
goals: To corrupt creatures and manipulate them for long-term schemes.
relations: Related to other aberration creatures and might serve as a master to corrupted beings.
environment: Can be found in diverse environments, as it does not require traditional sustenance.
strengths: Exceptional Dexterity enhances its stealth and agility, enabling it to ambush effectively.
weaknesses: Dependence on specific conditions for powering its abilities can be a tactical vulnerability.
attacks: Multiattack includes two Claw attacks dealing slashing and poison damage and one Fate-Altering Stinger attack that corrupts the target's fate.
most_powerful_ability: Corruption's Bond allows telepathic communication with corrupted creatures over any distance, even across planes.
senses: Possesses tremorsense that allows it to track foes effectively in various conditions.
skills: Highly skilled in Insight and Perception with proficiency in Stealth, enabling it to ambush effectively.
additional_information: Can turn invisible until it attacks, offering a tactical advantage.
Can compel corrupted beings to perform tasks using the geas spell.
Does not require air, food, drink, sleep, or ambient pressure.
test_queries: cunning large aberration that can turn invisible
creature that corrupts fates and inflicts poison damage
tactical monster with stealth and telepathy abilities
monster with special abilities for controlling others
